TypeSignature.Value: public class Tuple<T1,T2,T3> : IComparable, System.Collections.IStructuralComparable, System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable

.class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit Tuple`3<T1, T2, T3> extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IStructuralComparable, class System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable, class System.IComparable
Public Class Tuple(Of T1, T2, T3) Implements IComparable, IStructuralComparable, IStructuralEquatable
generic <typename T1, typename T2, typename T3> public ref class Tuple : IComparable, System::Collections::IStructuralComparable, System::Collections::IStructuralEquatable

typeparam.name: T1
typeparam.span: Tuple 第 1 個元件的型別。

span.span: The type of the tuple's first component.

typeparam.name: T2
typeparam.span: Tuple 第 2 個元件的型別。

span.span: The type of the tuple's second component.

typeparam.name: T3
typeparam.span: Tuple 第 3 個元件的型別。

span.span: The type of the tuple's third component.
Represents a 3-tuple, or triple.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Tuple 是具有特定數量和值序列的資料結構。A tuple is a data structure that has a specific number and sequence of values. 類別代表 3-tuple 或三個，也就是 tuple，其中有三個元件。The class represents a 3-tuple, or triple, which is a tuple that has three components. 您可以具現化藉由呼叫物件建構函式或靜態方法。You can instantiate a object by calling either the constructor or the static method. 您可以擷取值的 tuple 的元件所使用的唯讀， ，和執行個體屬性。You can retrieve the values of the tuple's components by using the read-only , , and instance properties. Tuple 常用於四種不同方式：Tuples are commonly used in four different ways: - 代表單一的資料集。To represent a single set of data. 比方說，tuple 可以代表資料庫記錄，而其元件可以表示個別欄位的記錄。For example, a tuple can represent a database record, and its components can represent individual fields of the record. - 提供讓您輕鬆存取、 和操作的資料集。To provide easy access to, and manipulation of, a data set. 下列範例會定義陣列物件，其中包含學生、 其平均測試分數和採取的測試數目的名稱。The following example defines an array of objects that contain the names of students, their average test scores, and the number of tests taken. 陣列傳遞至`ComputeStatistics`計算平均數和標準差測驗分數的方法。The array is passed to the `ComputeStatistics` method, which calculates the mean and standard deviation of the test scores. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`3.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`3.class/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`3.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`3.class/vb/example1.vb#1)] - 若要傳回多個值的方法，而不會使用從`out`參數 （在 C#) 或`ByRef`參數 （在 Visual Basic)。To return multiple values from a method without the use of `out` parameters (in C#) or `ByRef` parameters (in Visual Basic). 例如前, 一個範例傳回其摘要的測試分數的統計資料中物件。For example, the previous example returns its summary test score statistics in a object. - 若要將多個值傳遞至方法，以透過單一參數。To pass multiple values to a method through a single parameter. 例如，方法具有單一參數，可讓您提供一個執行緒啟動時執行之方法的值。For example, the method has a single parameter that lets you supply one value to the method that the thread executes at startup. 如果您提供物件做為方法引數中，您可以提供資料的三個項目在執行緒啟動常式。If you supply a object as the method argument, you can supply the thread’s startup routine with three items of data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `obj`參數會被視為等於目前的執行個體，在下列情況下：The `obj` parameter is considered to be equal to the current instance under the following conditions: - 它是物件。It is a object. - 其三個元件是與目前的執行個體相同的類型。Its three components are of the same types as the current instance. - 其三個元件的目前執行個體相等。Its three components are equal to those of the current instance. 是否相等由每個元件的預設物件相等比較子決定。Equality is determined by the default object equality comparer for each component. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫方法，以判斷是否有任何的陣列中的物件另一台的物件相等。The following example calls the method to determine whether any of the objects in an array of objects are equal to one another. 輸出會反映出事實，方法會傳回`true`比較時元件具有相等值的物件。The output reflects the fact that the method returns `true` when comparing objects whose components have equal values. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`3.Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`3.equals/cs/equals1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`3.Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`3.equals/vb/equals1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得目前 物件之第一個元件的值。

span.span: Gets the value of the current object's first component.

value.span: 目前 物件之第一個元件的值。

span.span: The value of the current object's first component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以動態決定的型別元件中有兩種：You can dynamically determine the type of the component in one of two ways: - 藉由呼叫`GetType`方法所傳回的值屬性。By calling the `GetType` method on the value that is returned by the property. - 藉由擷取物件，代表物件，並擷取第一個項目所傳回的陣列從其方法。By retrieving the object that represents the object, and retrieving the first element from the array that is returned by its method. ## Examples 下列範例會定義陣列物件，其中包含學生、 其平均測試分數和採取的測試數目的名稱。The following example defines an array of objects that contain the names of students, their average test scores, and the number of tests taken. 陣列傳遞至`ComputeStatistics`方法，這個方法會計算平均分數、 標準差和案例的數目從要計算統計資料。The array is passed to the `ComputeStatistics` method, which calculates the mean score, standard deviation, and number of cases from which the statistics are calculated. 這些值會儲存在所傳回的物件`ComputeStatistics`方法。These values are stored in the object that is returned by the `ComputeStatistics` method. 屬性包含的案例數目。The property contains the number of cases. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`3.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`3.class/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`3.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`3.class/vb/example1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: int IStructuralComparable.CompareTo (object other, System.Collections.IComparer comparer);
.method hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 System.Collections.IStructuralComparable.CompareTo(object other, class System.Collections.IComparer comparer) cil managed
Function CompareTo (other As Object, comparer As IComparer) As Integer Implements IStructuralComparable.CompareTo
virtual int System.Collections.IStructuralComparable.CompareTo(System::Object ^ other, System::Collections::IComparer ^ comparer) = System::Collections::IStructuralComparable::CompareTo;

param.name: other
param.span: 要與目前執行個體比較的物件。

span.span: An object to compare with the current instance.

param.name: comparer
param.span: 提供自訂規則進行比較的物件。

span.span: An object that provides custom rules for comparison.

summary.span: 使用指定的比較子將目前的 物件和指定的物件進行比較，並且傳回一個整數，表示目前的物件在排序順序中位於指定之物件的前面、後面還是相的位置。

span.span: Compares the current object to a specified object by using a specified comparer, and returns an integer that indicates whether the current object is before, after, or in the same position as the specified object in the sort order.

returns.span: 帶正負號的整數，可指出此執行個體以及排序次序中 的相對位置，如下表所示。

span.span: A signed integer that indicates the relative position of this instance and in the sort order, as shown in the following table.

span.description: 這個執行個體位於 之前。
這個執行個體和 的排序位置相同。
This instance and have the same position in the sort order.
這個執行個體位於 之後。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 雖然可以直接呼叫這個方法，但是最常呼叫此方法集合排序方法，包含了參數來排序集合的成員。Although this method can be called directly, it is most commonly called by collection sorting methods that include parameters to order the members of a collection. 例如，由呼叫方法和方法具現化所使用的物件建構函式。For example, it is called by the method and the method of a object that is instantiated by using the constructor. > [!CAUTION] > 方法僅供用於排序作業。The method is intended for use in sorting operations. 此外，它不應該使用時比較的主要目的是要判斷兩個物件是否相等。It should not be used when the primary purpose of a comparison is to determine whether two objects are equal. 若要判斷兩個物件是否相等，請呼叫方法。To determine whether two objects are equal, call the method. ## Examples 下列範例會建立的陣列組成學生的名稱、 平均測試分數以及測試數目的物件。The following example creates an array of objects that consist of a student's name, mean test score, and number of tests. 它會顯示未排序的順序陣列中的每個 tuple 的元件，來排序陣列，然後呼叫以排序順序顯示每個 tuple 的值。It displays the component of each tuple in the array in unsorted order, sorts the array, and then calls to display the value of each tuple in sorted order. 若要排序的陣列，此範例會定義泛型`ScoreComparer`類別可實作介面和排序依其第二個元件，而不是其第一個元件的值的遞增順序物件。To sort the array, the example defines a generic `ScoreComparer` class that implements the interface and sorts the objects in ascending order by the value of their second component rather than their first component. 請注意，此範例不會直接呼叫方法。Note that the example does not directly call the method. 這個方法會隱含地呼叫陣列中每個項目的方法。This method is called implicitly by the method for each element in the array. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`3.CompareTo#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`3.compareto/cs/compareto2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`3.CompareTo#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`3.compareto/vb/compareto2.vb#2)]

span.span: is not a object.

MemberSignature.Value: bool IStructuralEquatable.Equals (object other, System.Collections.IEqualityComparer comparer);

param.name: other
param.span: 與這個執行個體相互比較的物件。

span.span: The object to compare with this instance.

param.name: comparer
param.span: 物件，定義要用來評估這兩個物件是否相等的方法。

span.span: An object that defines the method to use to evaluate whether the two objects are equal.

summary.span: 傳回值，這個值表示依據指定的比較方法，目前的 物件是否等於指定的物件。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether the current object is equal to a specified object based on a specified comparison method.

returns.span: 如果目前的執行個體和指定的物件相等，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the current instance is equal to the specified object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 才呼叫實作`other`不`null`，而且如果它可以是成功轉換 （C# 中） 或 （在 Visual Basic) 轉換成其元件是相同的類型與目前的執行個體的物件。The implementation is called only if `other` is not `null`, and if it can be successfully cast (in C#) or converted (in Visual Basic) to a object whose components are of the same types as the current instance. 方法的第一個階段值要比較的物件實作。The method first passes the values of the objects to be compared to the implementation. 如果這個方法呼叫傳回`true`，方法是呼叫一次，並傳遞兩個值物件。If this method call returns `true`, the method is called again and passed the values of the two objects. 如果這個方法呼叫傳回`true`同樣地，此方法會呼叫第三個時間，並傳遞兩個值物件。If this method call returns `true` again, the method is called a third time and passed the values of the two objects. ## Examples 下列範例會定義`Item2Comparer`類別可實作介面，並變更的方式評估物件是否相等。The following example defines an `Item2Comparer` class that implements the interface and changes the way in which objects are evaluated for equality. 方法永遠都會傳回`true`傳遞時屬性值的兩個物件，並且呼叫方法，評估其屬性值。The method always returns `true` when it is passed the property values of two objects, and it calls the method to evaluate their property values. 如果這個方法呼叫傳回`true`、 其屬性值會傳遞至方法，它一定會傳回`true`。If this method call returns `true`, their property values are passed to the method, which always returns `true`. 如此一來，方法會測試是否相等的值只根據屬性。As a result, the method tests for equality based only on the value of the property. 輸出說明結果的資料集記錄類別中的名稱、 平均測試分數和學生人數的測試數目的物件。The output illustrates the result for a data set of objects that record the names, mean test score, and number of tests of students in a class. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`3.Equals#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`3.equals/cs/equals2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`3.Equals#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`3.equals/vb/equals2.vb#2)]

param.name: comparer
param.span: 其 方法可以計算目前 物件之雜湊碼的物件。

span.span: An object whose method calculates the hash code of the current object.

summary.span: 使用指定的計算方法，計算目前 物件的雜湊碼。

span.span: Calculates the hash code for the current object by using a specified computation method.

returns.span: 32 位元帶正負號的整數雜湊碼。

span.span: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 方法只會包裝呼叫`comparer`物件的實作。The method simply wraps a call to the `comparer` object's implementation. 用來計算雜湊程式碼的演算法應該會傳回相同的雜湊程式碼，其中兩個會被視為相等的物件。The algorithm used to compute the hash code should return the same hash code for two objects that are considered to be equal.

span.span: Compares the current object to a specified object and returns an integer that indicates whether the current object is before, after, or in the same position as the specified object in the sort order.

span.span: A signed integer that indicates the relative position of this instance and in the sort order, as shown in the following table.

span.description: 這個執行個體位於 之前。

這個執行個體位於 之後。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 這個方法會提供實作類別。This method provides the implementation for the class. 雖然可以直接呼叫的方法，但是最常呼叫此方法的排序方法，例如集合的預設多載和，若要排序之集合的成員。Although the method can be called directly, it is most commonly called by the default overloads of collection sorting methods, such as and , to order the members of a collection. > [!CAUTION] > 方法僅供用於排序作業。The method is intended for use in sorting operations. 此外，它不應該使用時比較的主要目的是要判斷兩個物件是否相等。It should not be used when the primary purpose of a comparison is to determine whether two objects are equal. 若要判斷兩個物件是否相等，請呼叫方法。To determine whether two objects are equal, call the method. 方法使用的預設物件的比較子來比較每個元件。The method uses the default object comparer to compare each component. ## Examples 下列範例會建立的陣列元件組成學生的名稱、 平均測試分數以及測試數目的物件。The following example creates an array of objects whose components consist of a student's name, mean test score, and number of tests. 它會顯示未排序的順序陣列中的每個 tuple 的元件，來排序陣列，然後呼叫以排序順序顯示每個 tuple。It displays the components of each tuple in the array in unsorted order, sorts the array, and then calls to display each tuple in sorted order. 輸出會顯示其第一個元件的陣列，已排序。The output shows that the array has been sorted by its first component. 請注意，此範例不會直接呼叫方法。Note that the example does not directly call the method. 這個方法會隱含地呼叫陣列中每個項目的方法。This method is called implicitly by the method for each element in the array. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`3.CompareTo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`3.compareto/cs/compareto1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`3.CompareTo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`3.compareto/vb/compareto1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法所傳回的字串形式 (*Item1*， *Item2*， *Item3*)，其中*Item1*， *Item2*，和*Item3*代表的值， ，和屬性，分別。The string returned by this method takes the form (*Item1*, *Item2*, *Item3*), where *Item1*, *Item2*, and *Item3* represent the values of the , , and properties, respectively. 如果有任何屬性值為`null`，則會呈現為。If any of the property values is `null`, it is represented as . ## Examples 下列範例說明方法。The following example illustrates the method.
